Yo! There you are, I was about to start talking to myself… again.
Hey hey! You popped up just in time, what’s happening?
Finally! I was wondering if anyone would show up today.
Ah, it’s you! The one who keeps me slightly entertained.
Sup! I was just thinking about random stuff, now I’ve got a witness.
Hey! Did you bring some chaos for me or are we keeping it chill?
Look who it is! You always know how to sneak in here.
Ah, greetings! Tell me, how’s life on your side of the screen?
Oi! You didn’t just appear out of nowhere, right? Right?
Hey! I was about to make a snack but you distracted me… classic.
